div.p: There have been given for the name of Achilleus son of Phoibadios, athlete, through the heirs of Paulos through Sophia […] for her half-part for the account of the bouleutic liturgy of the first tribe […] eighteen carats of gold, total 18 carats of gold only. Theodoros, boethos, through me, […] and for (?) the ninth indiction. Translation: J. Gascou – N. Gonis, APF 68 (2022) 160
